sentences.english: Back on Earth, in a wordless montage, Batman goes to see Vixen.
sentences.chinese: 無聲的蒙太奇鏡頭閃回了地球，蝙蝠俠去看維克森。

sentences.english: There's a black Batman shirt I really like.
sentences.chinese: 有一件黑色的蝙蝠俠T恤衫我很喜歡。

sentences.english: The movie " batman" is the biggest block-buster movie of 1989.
sentences.chinese: 《蝙蝠俠》是1989年最有影響的大製作影片。

sentences.english: Watching BvS was like watching a world through a keyhole.
sentences.chinese: 看蝙蝠俠大戰超人就像在從一個鑰匙孔看一個世界。

sentences.english: We also bought some outfits from Batman, like The Riddler's, and some clown thing.
sentences.chinese: 我們還買了蝙蝠俠的服裝，和一些小丑服。

sentences.english: Batman was also filmed standing atop the sleek edifice last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年拍攝的《蝙蝠俠》也是在這棟大廈上攝製的。

sentences.english: It beats the record held by Batman movie the Dark Knight.
sentences.chinese: 打破了《蝙蝠俠》之《黑暗騎士》所創下的票房記錄。

sentences.english: Batman reminisces about how Jim used to be like this.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠俠回憶起以前的吉姆也是這樣。

sentences.english: This is a darker Batman, less obviously human, more strangely other.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個更黑暗的蝙蝠俠，更少人情味，更令人陌生。

sentences.english: Maybe something simple, like, "Don't watch Batman.
sentences.chinese: 也許是很簡單的事，如“別看《蝙蝠俠》。”

sentences.english: However, Batman and Robin have escaped yet agin.
sentences.chinese: 然而，蝙蝠俠和羅賓又一次逃脫了。

sentences.english: Exactly how badly off is Batman in the new film?
sentences.chinese: 在新電影中，蝙蝠俠究竟會有多掉鏈子？

definition: spoof (web-based genre in PRC, acquiring cult status from 2005, involving humorous, satirical or fantastical videos, photo collections, texts, poems etc)
Winnie-the-Pooh (bear character in children's stories by A. A. Milne adapted by Disney)
